entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
